1: <pb/><e>A bit Asaf ti'</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, manchak ach tz'inji, manchak ach oc wanajok.</t>
2: <t>Iltok eb ajc'ul oc en, eb c'am chach ocheni, uchwajwom eb, cax chi caktzaj oc eb en.</t>
3: <t>Yob tzet yetal mayal na eb watx'nen yin a conob taynebil oj.</t>
4: <t>Max na eb on ul c'ayon elok, yet watx' c'am chon beytok yin nacional, cax c'amxa chon nalaytek, ayon Israel on ti'.</t>
5: <t>Max yak' eb jun yobal trato en. Max wajnanen eb, junxanej max yun yelol nabal eb ti':</t>
6: <t>A eb aj Edom, c'al eb Ismael, c'al juntzanxa eb yinatil xal Agar, c'al eb yet Moab,</t>
7: <t>eb Gebal, eb Amón, eb Amalec, eb filisteo, eb cajan bay Tiro,</t>
8: <t>toltax eb aj Asiria, max junanej ba yetok eb yinatil Lot yuj col-lay eb.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Axca max ot eb Madián, axca tu' chot c'apax eb, axca max ot cham Sísara, c'al cham Jabín bay ti a' Cisón.</t>
10: <t>A bay Endor max cam eb, max occan eb yaxilalok tx'otx' tx'otx'.</t>
11: <t>Axca max ot cham Oreb, c'al cham Zeeb, caytu' chot masanil eb is capitanil eb; axca max ot cham Zeba, c'al cham Zalmuna, caytu' chot eb is mimek yajawil eb,</t>
12: <t>tol max yochej c'ul eb max occan tx'otx' a tx'otx' yetok eb.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, ut cantok eb axca k'alem yuj cakxuchum, axca wal takin xak te' chi ilay bey yuj cak'ek'.</t>
14: <t>Axca wal tojcan bolob xol te', cax chi tz'acantok witzlak yuj k'ak',</t>
15: <t>cayokab tu' chot okten ec' eb yetok yowal a c'ul. Xibtejcan eb yetok a k'ak'alc'ulal.</t>
16: <t>Mamin, iel q'uixwil eb, yet watx' chi tzakloj eb entak.</t>
17: <t>Q'uixwokokab aj c'ul eb yin tojbalk'inal. Camokab eb yin q'uixwilal,</t>
18: <t>yet watx' chi yojtaknej el eb tol asan ach Jehová ach, asan ach Cham Axac'al Ocok bay masanil yulyibank'inal ti'.</t>
